input_schema.description: A cat photograph to evaluate for intentional framing — whether the composition feels deliberate and positions the cat as the natural focal point of the image.
A cat photograph to evaluate for subject placement and balance — whether the cat's position within the frame feels purposeful and visually weighted.
A cat photograph to evaluate for effective use of surrounding space — whether the environment around the cat supports the subject without overwhelming or diminishing it.
A cat photograph to evaluate for compositional flow — whether lines, edges, contrasts, and light gradients guide the viewer's eye naturally toward the cat.

description: Scores how deliberately a cat photograph is composed around its subject. Evaluates subject placement and balance, effective use of surrounding space, and compositional flow toward the cat to determine whether the framing feels intentional — whether the image was made for the cat, not merely contains one.
